Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of the query's entity.
Columns.Name: Entity

Columns.Description: The type of the query's entity.
Columns.Name: EntityType

Columns.Description: Name of the metric for the record (e.g. AppsCompleted, AppsKilled, AppsFailed , etc).
Columns.Name: MetricName

Columns.Description: Value of metric in the record.
Columns.Name: MetricValue

Columns.Description: Information about the record. For example a record may be tagged with 'yarn' if it is in the yarn context.
Columns.Name: Tags

Columns.Description: Name of cluster.
Columns.Name: ClusterName

Columns.Description: Type of cluster (e.g. LLAP or Hadoop).
Columns.Name: ClusterType

Columns.Description: Name of host where log was emitted.
Columns.Name: HostName

Columns.Description: Time that query was submitted.
Columns.Name: QuerySubmissionTime

Columns.Description: Time that query was completed.
Columns.Name: QueryCompletionTime

Columns.Description: The domain associated with the query.
Columns.Name: Domain

Columns.Description: The client user that submitted the request.
Columns.Name: RequestUser

Columns.Description: The execution mode of the query.
Columns.Name: ExecutionMode

Columns.Description: The user of the Hive instance executing the query.
Columns.Name: User

Columns.Description: The queue the query was served from.
Columns.Name: Queue

Columns.Description: The tables read by the query.
Columns.Name: TablesRead

Columns.Description: The query client's IP address.
Columns.Name: ClientIpAddress

Columns.Description: True if the query is a Tez query.
Columns.Name: IsTez

Columns.Description: True if the query is a MapReduce query.
Columns.Name: IsMapReduce

Columns.Description: The name of the thread running the query.
Columns.Name: ThreadName

Columns.Description: The type of hive instance running the query.
Columns.Name: HiveInstanceType

Columns.Description: The session ID of the query.
Columns.Name: SessionId

Columns.Description: The operation associated with log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
